original_text: But burn the rest of the bull's body outside the camp, with its skin and the food in its stomach. It is an offering to make the priests clean from their sins.
korean_text: 그 수소의 고기와 가죽과 똥을 진 밖에서 불사르라 이는 속죄제니라

sentences.original_text: But burn the rest of the bull's body
with its skin and the food in its stomach
to make the priests clean from their sins
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들이 죄에서 깨끗하게 되기 위한 것입니다
